committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the post office building being constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the "M. P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the post office building in Liberty, Texas, as the M.P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Senior, Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the post office building being constructed in West Liberty, Texas, as the "M. P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Sr., Post Office Building".
